title: Hero Lectro hikes prices by up to Rs 5,000 across models to offset rising input, freight costs
description: "While the price revision of our product line has been necessitated by external market factors such as increasing freight and input materials cost, it also ensures that our quality continues to meet customer expectations and global benchmarks," Hero Lectro CEO Aditya Munjal said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
